text:
<@ULBP4M3LK> FYI, don't forget to add the `playsinline` attribute for iOS background video support.
```<video autoplay muted loop playsinline poster="{{ poster.src }}" preload="none">
  <source src="{{ file.src }}" type="video/{{ file.src|split('.',3)|last }}" />
  <img src="{{ poster.src }}" alt="Video PNG Fallback" />
</video>```
